I have come up with a workaround while we wait for the permanent fix.
Instead of calling one_kernel, one_bias = one_lstm_cell.variables we can use one_kernel, one_bias = one_lstm_cell._cell.variables. This calls variables on the original RNNCell passed in. I know it's generally not a good idea to call protected properties but it works.

body:
I have come up with a workaround while we wait for the permanent fix.
Instead of calling `one_kernel, one_bias = one_lstm_cell.variables` we can use `one_kernel, one_bias = one_lstm_cell._cell.variables`. This calls variables on the original RNNCell passed in. I know it's generally not a good idea to call protected properties but it works.
